EventSubscription.description: Indicates an event you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

properties.name: EventType
properties.description: The type of event you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

type.description: The type of event you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Unique name to identify an event subscription.

type.description: Unique name to identify an event subscription.

properties.name: SnsTopicArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic.

PermissionModel.description: Defines the roles and credentials that AWS Resilience Hub would use while creating the application, importing its resources, and running an assessment.

properties.name: CrossAccountRoleArns
properties.description: Defines a list of role Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to be used in other accounts. These ARNs are used for querying purposes while importing resources and assessing your application.

type.description: Defines a list of role Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to be used in other accounts. These ARNs are used for querying purposes while importing resources and assessing your application.

properties.name: InvokerRoleName
properties.description: Existing AWS IAM role name in the primary AWS account that will be assumed by AWS Resilience Hub Service Principle to obtain a read-only access to your application resources while running an assessment.

type.description: Existing AWS IAM role name in the primary AWS account that will be assumed by AWS Resilience Hub Service Principle to obtain a read-only access to your application resources while running an assessment.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Defines how AWS Resilience Hub scans your resources. It can scan for the resources by using a pre-existing role in your AWS account, or by using the credentials of the current IAM user.

type.description: Defines how AWS Resilience Hub scans your resources. It can scan for the resources by using a pre-existing role in your AWS account, or by using the credentials of the current IAM user.

ResourceMapping.description: Resource mapping is used to map logical resources from template to physical resource

properties.name: AppTemplateBody
properties.description: A string containing full ResilienceHub app template body.

type.description: A string containing full ResilienceHub app template body.

properties.name: EventSubscriptions
properties.description: The list of events you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

type.description: The list of events you would like to subscribe and get notification for.

properties.name: ResiliencyPolicyArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resiliency Policy.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resiliency Policy.

properties.name: AppArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App.

properties.name: DriftStatus
properties.description: Indicates if compliance drifts (deviations) were detected while running an assessment for your application.

type.description: Indicates if compliance drifts (deviations) were detected while running an assessment for your application.
